{"id":622472462,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1642508155,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/622472462/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"typedef long long int ll;\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    double exp(double x ,ll n){\n        if(n == 0)\n            return 1.0 ;\n        double half = exp(x ,n/2);\n        if(n%2 ==0){\n            return half*half;\n        }\n        return half*half*x;\n    }\n    \n    \n    \n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        ll N = n ;\n        if(n <0){\n            N = -N ;\n            x = 1/x;\n        }\n        double ans = exp(x,N);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
